title: mason.yaml
description: The mason.yaml schema for the mason ecosystem

bricks.description: A list of the registered bricks for the current workspace.

brickVersion.description: The version constraint for the associated brick (^1.0.0).

brickPath.description: The path location for the associated brick.

path.description: The local path to the associated brick (./path/to/brick).

git.description: The git location for the associated brick.

url.description: The git url for the associated brick (https://github.com/felangel/mason).

path.description: Path relative to the root of the repository (bricks/widget).

ref.description: Anything that git can use to identify a commit. Can be a branch name, tag, or commit hash.
